Row.Text: Provides a Watch Tower for free in all cities. Also provides Walls for free in the city in which it is built.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides a Watch Tower for free in all cities. Also provides Walls for free in the city in which it is built.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides a Watch Tower for free in all cities. Also provides Walls for free in the city in which it is built.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides a Watch Tower for free in all cities. Also provides Walls for free in the city in which it is built.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](NQ) [ENDCOLOR] Fournit une Tour de Guet gratuite dans chaque ville. Fournit des Remparts gratuits dans la ville de construction.
Watch Tower
Watch Tower
This is one of the many Watch Towers built along the Great Wall.
Watch Towers increase a city's Defense Strength by 5 and Hit Points by 50.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](NQ) [ENDCOLOR]Tour de Guet
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](NQ) [ENDCOLOR]C'est une des innombrables Tour de Guet construites le long de la Grande Muraille.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](NQ) [ENDCOLOR]Les Tours de Guet augmentent la puissance de d√©fense d'une ville de 5 et sa puissance de combat de 50.
